name: Trick or Eat
description:
Made for the #IWantToCreate #WeirderStuff2 Jam.

HOW DO I PLAY?

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint (Stamina bar will be added when jam voting period ends.)

Mouse - Look

WHAT DO I DO?

Gather all your dropped candies; Luckily enough the only working lights show where it dropped.

Do not touch the ghouls; They bite!
